title: my pixel 3a was reset to Factory. Since he asks to login with owner email but does not initiate phon
content:
my pixel 3a was reset to factory since it did it asks in a loop to sign in with owner's email. When i do and input password, it goes back to the screen "this phone needs the owner to sign in"... and back and back, and back
this phone is brand new and I cannot use it because it is blocked.
What to do now??? How do I unlock the phone?
